reliable|(adj)|đáng tin cậy|Ví dụ:|Gideon is very reliable - if he says he'll do something, he'll do it.
rude|(adj)|bất lịch sự, thô lỗ|Ví dụ:|He's got bad manners - he's rude to everyone.
selfish|(adj)|ích kỷ|Ví dụ:|Women don't like selfish men.
sensitive|(adj)|nhạy cảm|Ví dụ:|Her reply showed that she was very sensitive to criticism.
stubborn|(adj)|bướng bỉnh, ngoan cố|Ví dụ:|His girlfriend is a stubborn girl.
patient|(adj)|kiên nhẫn, nhẫn nại, bền chí|Ví dụ:|Be patient with her - she's very young.
humorous|(adj)|hài hước|Ví dụ:|Her boyfriend is very humorous.
sincere|(adj)|chân thành|Ví dụ:|He seems so sincere.
generous|(adj)|rộng lượng|Ví dụ:|He is a very generous man.
honest|(adj)|thật thà, trung thực, thành thật|Ví dụ:|He had an honest face.
kind|(adj)|tử tế, tốt bụng|Ví dụ:|She's a very kind and thoughtful person.
loyal|(adj)|trung thành|Ví dụ:|Jack has been a loyal worker in this company for almost 50 years.
modest|(adj)|khiêm tốn|Ví dụ:|He's very modest about his achievement.
nasty|(adj)|cáu kỉnh|Ví dụ:|She has a nasty habit with people in meetings.
shy|(adj)|nhút nhát, bẽn lẽn|Ví dụ:|I'm too shy to ask.
sociable|(adj)|chan hòa, hòa đồng|Ví dụ:|They are not so sociable.
reserved|(adj)|dè dặt, kín đáo|Ví dụ:|She is reserved woman.
confident|(adj)|tự tin|Ví dụ:|Are you confident?
pleasant|(adj)|dễ chịu, vui vẻ, dễ thương|Ví dụ:|Pleasant colleagues are easy to work with.
clever|(adj)|lanh lợi, khôn ngoan|Ví dụ:|Fiona is very clever at physics.
thoughtful|(adj)|sâu sắc, thận trọng, ân cần|Ví dụ:|Simon is very thoughtful.
proud|(adj)|tự hào|Ví dụ:|He’s very proud of his daughters.
lazy|(adj)|lười biếng|Ví dụ:|You are so lazy.
crazy|(adj)|gàn dở, điên|Ví dụ:|She’s the craziest person I’ve ever met.
silly|(adj)|ngớ ngẩn|Ví dụ:|She looks really silly.
bossy|(adj)|hách dịch|Ví dụ:|She was very bossy, scared of nobody.
gossip|(n)|người mách lẻo|Ví dụ:|Charlie is a real gossip.
extrovert|(n)|người hướng ngoại|Ví dụ:|Most sales people are extroverts.
coward|(n)|kẻ hèn nhát|Ví dụ:|He's a liar and a coward.
big-head|(n)|người tự cao|Ví dụ:|He is a big-head.
snob|(n)|người đua đòi, kẻ hợm hĩnh|Ví dụ:|Don't be such a snob like that!
liar|(n)|kẻ nói dối|Ví dụ:|Shelley wasn't a very good liar.
ambitious|(adj)|nhiều tham vọng, kỳ vọng|Ví dụ:|He is an ambitious young manager.
introvert|(n)|người hướng nội|Ví dụ:|He was described as an introvert.
stingy|(adj)|keo kiệt, bủn xỉn|Ví dụ:|He's really stingy and detestable.
arrogant|(adj)|kiêu ngạo, kiêu căng, ngạo mạn|Ví dụ:|He is so arrogant.
vain|(adj)|tự phụ, tự đắc|Ví dụ:|He is so vain.
absent-minded|(adj)|đãng trí|Ví dụ:|He is so absent-minded.
hostile|(adj)|căm ghét; không thân thiện|Ví dụ:|We were happy to move away from our hostile neighbor.
